ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output text/plain
import substringAfter from dw::core::Strings
var commucode = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.commucode)) "" else " and CommuCode eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.commucode ++ "'" var civico = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.civico)) "" else " and HouseNum1 eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.civico ++ "'" var regiogroup = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.regiogroup)) "" else " and Regiogroup eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.regiogroup ++ "'" var begru = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.begru)) "" else " and Begru eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.begru ++ "'" var street = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.street)) "" else " and Street eq '" ++ (attributes.queryParams.street replace /'/ with("''")) ++ "'" var city = if (isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.city)) "" else " and City1 eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.city ++ "'" var houseNum2 = if (attributes.queryParams.houseNum2 == null) "" else " and HouseNum2 eq '" ++ attributes.queryParams.houseNum2 ++ "'"
var out = commucode ++ regiogroup ++ begru ++ street ++ civico ++ city ++ houseNum2
---
substringAfter(out, "and")

on-error-continue.doc:name: On Error Continue
on-error-continue.when: lower(error.description) contains "non ci sono oggetti di allacciamento trovati"
